contents.main: Happiness looks gorgeous on you. ðŸ˜‡
The first thing women notice in men is their shoes. Good shoes will take you to good places. ðŸ‘ž
Happiness is the first measure of beauty.
Men who take care of their skin and carry moisturisers are men who are comfortable in their masculinity and also look good.
Clothes mean nothing when the person wearing them has no personality.
Men need skincare too. Men can use makeup too. You heard me. Leave the men and their choices to them.
